Key Match Events: Siebert issued a red card for a DOGSO foul
Delajod gave a penalty for handball that was later overturned by VAR
Petrescu was not able to see a handball and it was overturned by VAR
Saggi issued five yellow cards in the first half
Lukjancukas awarded two penalties in the Faroe Islands-North Macedonia match
Pre-Game Insights: UEFA Nations League 2024/25 - Referee Appointments MD1
Post-Match Reflections: Siebert lost control of the match after a series of controversies
Delajod was criticized for his performance, particularly for the handball penalty
Saggi was praised for his performance, particularly for issuing five yellow cards in the first half
Miscellaneous Highlights: UEFA Nations League 2024/25 - Referee Appointments MD1
Others: Keith Kennedy, a Northern Irish referee, passed away at the age of 33
Rien Koopman is a rather long-time experienced observer for regular Elite referees
Inqilab Məmmədov is a beach soccer referee and also an experienced Azeri Premier League referee
